title: nIlOtpalAmbikayA nirvANa
sahitya:
nIlOtpalAmbikayA nirvANa sukhapradayA rakSitOham


anupallavi

 vallIsha guruguha pUjitayA varalakSmI vANI sEvitayA 
hallIsha lAsya santuSTayA Arakta varNa shObhita karayA shrI


caraNam   kAshI kannaDagauLa dEshAdi vAsa dAsa janAvana tOSitayA 
vAsavAdi vandita vAgIsha vAsudEvAdyArAdhitayA shrI 
shivapurANa pradipAditayA shiva shankara nAyikayA shrI
